node.text: A mix of physical, creative, organizational and social tasks
A mix of physical, creative, organizational and social tasks
This category is split by time

Look for a friend or family member you havent spoken to in some time. Call, and or text them. If they dont respond find someone else, try to give this person at least 40 minutes of your attention if permitted.
Come up with a short standalone story. Write it down in a notebook and share it with someone.
Go on a hike. If you are going alone you can bring a podcast or audiobook. If you are going with someone try to bring up something youve been thinking about lately.
Read a book for over an hour
Pick up a book youve been meaning to read or are currently reading. Sit down with some water and read for at least and hour and a half.
Come up with a short standalone story. Write it down in a notebook and share it with someone.
How long does it take to do this task?
